ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:0.2_0: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:0.5_0: 37. The training rule on within their own country
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:1.2_0: At that time the nuns went wandering without a group of travelers where it was considered risky and dangerous within their own country.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:1.4_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized Thullanandā,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:1.5_0: “How can nuns go wandering without a group of travelers where it’s considered risky and dangerous within their own country?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:1.6_0: “Is it true, monks, that nuns do this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:1.10_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:1.11_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:1.12.1_0: ‘If a nun goes wandering without a group of travelers where it is considered risky and dangerous within her own country, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:2.1.4_0: ... The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:2.1.6_0: in the country where she is living.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:2.1.8_0: a place where criminals are camped, eating, standing, sitting, or lying down has been seen along that road.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:2.1.10_0: criminals have been seen along that road, injuring, robbing, or beating people.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:2.1.14_0: when the villages are a chicken’s flight apart, then for every next village he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:2.1.15_0: When it is an uninhabited area, a wilderness, then for every six kilometers he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:2.2.4_0: They burn in times of trouble,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:2.2.6_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc37:2.2.7_0: The seventh rule, the training rule on married girls, is finished.
